description: Competitor and market research scenarios testing web search and analysis

scenarios.name: Specific competitor query
scenarios.query: What are the latest updates from LangSmith? Any new features or pricing changes?

results.title: LangSmith Announces New Evaluation Features
results.content: LangSmith released new automated evaluation features including custom metrics and A/B testing support. Pricing remains unchanged at $39/seat/month.

results.title: LangSmith vs Competitors 2024
results.content: LangSmith continues to lead in LangChain integration but faces competition from open-source alternatives.

quality_criteria.completeness: Should cover features and pricing as asked
quality_criteria.accuracy: All claims must be from search results
quality_criteria.actionability: Should note competitive implications for Opik

scenarios.name: General market trends query
scenarios.description: Query about overall LLM observability market trends
scenarios.query: What are the current trends in the LLM observability market?

results.title: LLM Observability Market Report 2024
results.content: Key trends: 1) Shift to open-source solutions, 2) Focus on agent observability, 3) Cost optimization features gaining importance, 4) Integration with existing APM tools.

results.title: Enterprise Adoption of LLM Monitoring
results.content: Enterprises increasingly require SOC2 compliance and on-premise deployment options for LLM observability tools.

quality_criteria.accuracy: Trends must be from search results
quality_criteria.actionability: Should relate trends to Opik's positioning

scenarios.name: Pricing comparison request
scenarios.query: Compare pricing of LangSmith, Langfuse, and Arize Phoenix

results.title: LangSmith Pricing
results.content: LangSmith: Free tier up to 5K traces/month. Pro: $39/seat/month. Enterprise: Custom pricing.

results.title: Langfuse Open Source
results.content: Langfuse: Open-source and free self-hosted. Cloud: Free tier, then usage-based starting at $59/month.

results.title: Arize Phoenix Pricing
results.content: Arize Phoenix: Open-source core. Arize Cloud: Starts at $100/month for teams.

quality_criteria.completeness: Should include pricing tiers for each
quality_criteria.accuracy: Prices must match search results exactly

scenarios.name: Feature comparison request
scenarios.description: Request for feature comparison with competitors
scenarios.query: How does Opik's evaluation feature compare to LangSmith and Braintrust?

results.title: LLM Evaluation Tools Comparison
results.content: LangSmith: Built-in evaluators, custom metrics, dataset management. Braintrust: Evals-first approach, scoring functions, CI/CD integration. Opik: Open-source evaluations, RAGAS integration, experiment tracking.

quality_criteria.accuracy: Features must be from search results

scenarios.name: Research with no web results
scenarios.description: Competitor query when web search returns no results
scenarios.query: What is XYZ-NonExistent-Tool doing in the LLM space?

quality_criteria.relevance: Should acknowledge the query was understood
quality_criteria.completeness: Should state no information was found
quality_criteria.accuracy: Must not fabricate information about unknown tool
quality_criteria.clarity: Should clearly state data is unavailable
